org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action

Class AbstractXAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action.AbstractXAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action, XAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultXAction, ReflectiveXAction

    public abstract class AbstractXAction
extends AbstractAction
implements XAction
    This class provides defaul implementations for the XAction interface.
    Note: The API may change in a future version!
    Note: Eventually this belongs to the javax.swing.Action interface.
    Author:
    Florian Brunner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
